meaning_str.bing:
n. 刀
v. 用刀伤害（或杀害）
网络. 小刀；刀子；餐刀

刀具；刀；刀片；匕首；切割工具

1.en: He went to a rotten log near at hand and began to dig under one end of it with his Barlow knife.
1.cn: 他走到近处的一根烂树干旁边，开始用他的巴露折刀在一头开挖起来。

2.en: Then her mother gave her a knife, and said, "Cut a piece off your heel. When you are queen you will no longer have to go on foot. "
2.cn: 她妈妈给了她一把刀，说，“把脚后跟削掉一部分，只要你当上了王后，还在乎这脚趾头干嘛，你想到哪儿去根本就不需要用脚了。”

3.en: Calmly, the man withdrew a small knife from his pocket and carved a mark on the boat at the spot where he dropped the sword.
3.cn: 那个人不慌不忙地从衣袋里取出一个小刀，在船舷上落下宝剑的地方刻了一个记号。

0.en: I have a knife in my foot, Sergeant. Oh yes. Of course. That's it, the knife. What is your name soldier? Smitty Riker.
0.cn: 我脚上插着刀，中士。噢，是的，当然。是这把刀。你叫什么名字？士兵。史密提·瑞克。

1.en: I've never seen a man suffocate before. I didn't have a knife.
1.cn: 我是头一回见人窒息而死。我没带刀。

2.en: But whether or not he took this, he certainly took the knife.
2.cn: 但无论他是否拿了这个，刀肯定是他拿的。

3.en: They found her with a knife once. She seemed to be cutting herself.
3.cn: 有一次她被发现手上拿着刀。看起来她自残了。

4.en: And this is an oiled cloth and an oiled knife, OK? Cos it sticks. OK.
4.cn: 要用浸油的布和沾油的刀，因为那很粘。好的。

5.en: And the man who shot me here and here, he stabbed me when his rifle jammed. I pulled the knife away and slit his throat.
5.cn: 那个打中我这里和这里的人，他的枪卡住后，还刺了我一刀。我把刀拔了出来，割了他的喉。

6.en: Who threw the knife? I did Sergeant. Private Kirzinski. You're part Indian.
6.cn: 谁扔的刀？是我，中士。列兵科恩斯基。你是印地安部族。

7.en: Wow, that looks great. What'd you use to make the blood? A knife. I'm actually hurt.
7.cn: 很逼真啊，那血是用什么弄的？用刀，我真的受伤了。

8.en: So, what you're going to do is you're going to take your knife, slice him right up the belly.
8.cn: 所以你要做的就是拿起刀，从它的肚皮上切下去。

9.en: Well, Earl, I guess desperation cuts like a knife. Man, being white is easy.
9.cn: Earl 绝望的心境就已如刀割啊。天啊 白人的生活真舒服。

10.en: No. Your name is Private Idiot. You know why? Cause I have a knife in my foot.
10.cn: 不。你的名字是“列兵白痴”。你可知为何？因为我脚上插着刀。

11.en: The knife, for example, is the last thing you learn. Okay? Okay. Position.
11.cn: 拿刀来举个例子，刀是你要学习的最后一件武器，明白吗？好的。找位置。

12.en: Who place the knife there, Private? It was an accident, Sergeant. I was playing stretch.
12.cn: 谁会把刀插在哪儿？列兵。这是个意外，中士。我在练拉伸。

13.en: So that you or a servant can keep watch. Then we'll have time to investigate the loss of the knife.
13.cn: 这样您或者哪个仆人能盯着点，这样我们也有时间来调查刀丢失的事了。

14.en: It's the man who's been phoning you from London. He's got a knife on him. One of those Swiss Army types.
14.cn: 就是从伦敦一直打电话来的那个人。他身上带了一把刀，一把瑞士军刀。

15.en: How much candy do we have to hand out before I go trick-or-treating? Can't I just take a knife and go by myself?
15.cn: 我们还要分发多少糖果我才能去讨糖果啊？我就不能拿把刀自己去吗？

16.en: We've all come a long way. There's a lot to be proud of. For God's sake, just drive in the knife, why don't you!
16.cn: 我们都有了长足的进步，很多都值得骄傲 。老天爷，你们干脆一刀捅死小爷算了。

17.en: Aren't you? Well, let us review the facts. I have lost a valuable paper knife. Given to the late Lord Grantham by the King of Sweden.
17.cn: 是吗？我们来回顾一下事实，我丢了一把很贵重的裁纸刀，是瑞典国王赠给已故的格兰瑟姆伯爵的。

18.en: All I know is this. I find Pegg in this room and my paper knife is gone. He comes into the room again and a very valuable piece of Japanese netsuke is missing.
18.cn: 我只知道，佩格一进我房间，我的裁纸刀就不见了，他再进来一次，一个珍贵的日本吊坠也不见了。

19.en: Now, while you scold us, I'm going to get a knife and a fork. Joe may be sloppy, but Sheldon's not.
19.cn: 你训斥我们时，容我去拿一套刀叉，乔可以邋遢，但谢尔顿不能邋遢。
